ComicInfo.Title: Space Between Annual 2024; Destiny, NY: Somebody's Waiting; Gangster Ass Barista: Frappy Hour; Wild Wisps: The Mythic Nari
ComicInfo.Penciller: Stefano Di Pietro, Mario Torrisi, Nabetse Zitro
ComicInfo.Inker: Stefano Di Pietro, Mario Torrisi, Nabetse Zitro
ComicInfo.Summary:
EMERALD FANTASIES features full-color stories set in the worlds of...
DESTINY, NY: Lilith is the last surviving member of a mystical crime family. She tries to navigate her new role as boss without bringing more pain to her life... or to her girlfriend, Logan McBride, who was the subject of an incredible prophecy.
GANGSTER ASS BARISTA: Trinity used to be in a biker gang, and now she works at an NYC coffeeshop. She wants to leave her old ways behind, but the old Trinity just may awaken if customers keep testing her patience.
...and introducing WILD WISPS! Kingdoms clash and humans bond with mysterious creatures called Wisps that have the power to win wars... and change the world, for better or worse.
